title: Goons backed by local polititions attacked intern doctors in LLRM Medical College Meerut UP.
selftext: We are receiving death threat calls daily , even after multiple attempts to have authorities on our side it's been 3 days since the incident and the person involved on 20th Feb night came to the campus with around 50 people planning an attack but tte students called on 112 . He's gathering false political support to harass and is seeking an opportunity to strike at hostels no one is safe can't perform daily activities mental harassment is on peak.
comments: How or why did it start?

They were roaming in campus 2-3 days before and were threatening students inside campus like " give ragging on the road" "tum jante nhi ho hum kon hai" . That lead to an argument between the students and those goons
UP being UP ðŸ˜”. Hope students get justice
